reviewtext: It's a short ethernet cable (only needed it to run between my router and a device practically next to it)It works like an ethernet cable should(Relatively) CheapThe snagfree design is better than I've seen on many others. It doesn't cover the tab itself making it hard to release like other cables. I found it quite neat that it just has guards on both sides of the tab that extend a bit past the end of it so that things can't (easily) snag on the tab and still be very easy to depress when you want to disconnect the cable.
